name: Boho Breeze
description:
Embrace comfort and style with our Essential Harem Pants. Featuring a soft, breathable fabric, elastic waistband for comfort, and a chic loose fit, these pants are perfect for yoga or casual wear. Available in various colors, they're a must-have for relaxed, everyday fashion.

Key Features:

Material: High-quality, lightweight fabric that offers breathability and flexibility.

Fit: Comfortable, loose fit with a tapered ankle to suit all body types.

Design: Available in a range of vibrant colors and patterns, inspired by bohemian style.

Waistband: Elastic waistband with drawstring for an adjustable, secure fit.

Versatility: Perfect for yoga, dance, travel, or just lounging at home.

Care Instructions: Easy to care for, machine washable.

Sizes: One size fits all types of body

Our Bohemian Bliss Harem Pants are not just a fashion statement but a testament to comfort and versatility. Whether you're practicing yoga, heading to a festival, or just relaxing at home, these pants will be your go-to choice for a casual yet chic look.
